detailsSection:
The integration of Microsoft BizTalk Server 2009 and Microsoft Office SharePoint 2007 brings a whole new set of capabilities to end users. SharePoint 2007 gives BizTalk Server a “face,” providing human workflow features and dashboard functionality. 

This white paper describes the results that you can achieve by combining the two products, and tells how to configure them. It also includes best practices for setting up an architecture with these products.
detailsSection_file_name: BizTalk Server 2009 and SharePoint 2007 Integration - Best Practices - Technical White Paper.pdf
BizTalk Server 2009 and SharePoint 2007 Integration - Best Practices - Technical White Paper.docx
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click the Download button on this page next to the download that you want.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
